subject: Organized Labor
Football
Collective Bargaining
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. owners ratified a 10-year proposal that will end the four-month-long lockout next Wednesday, with one big condition: the players have to re-form their union and approve the deal themselves.
snippet: N.F.L. owners ratified a 10-year proposal that will end the four-month-long lockout next Wednesday, with one big condition: the players have to re-form their union and approve the deal themselves.
